title: Which streaming service has slashed price during ongoing COVID-19 pandemic? - Quora

response.answer_text: I can't speak to other areas, but Comcast was offering internet to low income families for $9.95/month in SWFL. I don't know what speed it was or the particulars of enrolling, though. Side note: Still not an incentive for me. I've heard too many stories about bad customer service from friends.
